examples.example: 妈妈买了新鲜的茭白，准备做一顿美味的菜肴。

translate.english: Mother bought fresh water bamboo shoots and prepares to make a delicious dish.

examples.example: 我今天用茭白炒了一盘色香味俱佳的菜，家人都说特别好吃。

translate.english: I cooked a dish with wild rice stems today which has excellent color, aroma and taste, and all the family members said it was extremely delicious.

examples.example: 餐桌上摆着用茭白烹制的美食，散发着诱人的香气。

translate.english: On the table are delicacies cooked with wild rice stem, giving off an inviting aroma.
